channel.title: How to change action ID of something?
channel.description:
I added a new interface to my client and now I get duplicated case error when I want to add some effects to my action buttons. So, how can I change the action ID of an interface, ect so I don't already have the same ID ?
Thanks

item.title: How to change action ID of something?
item.dc:creator: @I_Hope_I I Hope I
item.description:
@I_Hope_I wrote:

[quote=“Clawz fury, post:2, topic:384247”]Use integers.

eg:

Declare

public int portal;

Then when you click the portal…

portal = 0;

Then in the case:

case 1: if(portal == 0) triggerTele(1,1,0); if(portal == 1) triggerTele(10,10,0); break;

^^ That would teleport you to x: 1, y:1, and height: 0, because the integer portal was equal to 0.[/quote]
Ok thanks.

Read full topic
item.source: How to change action ID of something?

item.title: How to change action ID of something?
item.dc:creator: @Clawz_fury lare69
item.description:
@Clawz_fury wrote:

Use integers.

eg:

Declare

public int portal;

Then when you click the portal…

portal = 0;

Then in the case:

case 1: if(portal == 0) triggerTele(1,1,0); if(portal == 1) triggerTele(10,10,0); break;

^^ That would teleport you to x: 1, y:1, and height: 0, because the integer portal was equal to 0.
